EmailTemplate.name: 18-NFI:TEPS_TXLE-Partners noncampaign-Email-POL SPIF Phase 2-T003JV.Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Your sales incentive from Nokia has arrived
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
View as web page <[[{{system.viewAsWebpageLink}}]]> Partners, You are receiving this email because you have either registered to participate in the Nokia Optical LAN (formerly POL) sales incentive program, or you are already actively selling or have sold our POL solution but have not yet registered. For those still needing to register, please contact your Nokia Partner Sales Manager and join your industry peers who have already begun earning exciting prizes. It’s not too late to cash in on this opportunity. By participating in this sales incentive program, you will be rewarded for Nokia Optical LAN approved and closed deals through December 31, 2019. To help you get started earning prizes, let our Participation Requirements and Process Guide <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/article/Nokia-Optical-LAN-Incentive-Program> serve as your go-to resource, taking you step by step through the process.
- Learn How to Register an Opportunity - Learn How to Register a Closed Deal - Learn How to Claim points for prizes
Additionally, the following resource materials are available to support your Optical LAN sales activities:
Resources VARs Distributors
Reqs & Process Guide Document <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0692M00000IFA1qQAH> Document <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0692M00000IFA21QAH>
Document (Indirect Reseller) <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0692M00000IFA24QAH>
Demo Nokia Incentive Program Tool (Claim Process) <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0692M00000IE1SuQAL> Nokia Incentive Program Tool (Claim Process) <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0692M00000IE1SuQAL>
Webcast
Recorded webcast (Option 1) <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0692M00000IFELfQAP>
Recorded webcast (Option 2) <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0692M00000IDzEHQA1>
Executive Summary Presentation <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0694100000GUjQYAA1> Presentation <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0694100000GUjQTAA1>
Deal Registration presentation Presentation <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=06941000003GmofAAC> Audio presentation <https://www.partners.nokia.com/s/documentpage?Id=0694100000GTPOtAAP>
Training POL courses <https://learningstore.nokia.com/partner/item/n.1489518527001> POL courses <https://learningstore.nokia.com/partner/item/n.1489518527001>
Should you have any additional questions about the program or how to register, please contact your Nokia Partner Sales Manager.
The Nokia Global Partner Program © {{my.CopyrightYear}} Nokia.
Nokia: Karaportti 3, 2610 Espoo, Finland Contact Us <[[{{my.ContactUs}}]]> | Privacy <[[{{my.PrivacyPolicy}}]]> | Unsubscribe <[[{{system.unsubscribeLink}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Twitter}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Linkedin}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Facebook}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Youtube}}]]> <[[{{my.SocialURL-Blog}}]]> This message has been sent to you because of your relationship with Nokia Networks or its third party licensors who are trusted partners of Nokia.
